channel.title: Lootshare/rareitems
channel.description:
Hi
i Realized that the lootshare only announces items that are "rare" "spirit sheilds, and claws."
i was wondering where i can edit the rareDrops list or w/e. i cant find it anywhere. i want my lootshare to anounce all items.
